item.title: U.N. Interstellar was her?
item.description: So I've seen the new Christopher Nolan movie Interstellar yesterday! I had very mixed feelings about it and I will definitely see it again soon. The movie turned out pretty different that I had imagined and that threw me a bit off. This blog post however is not about the …

item.title: Compression Distance
item.description:
So I've recently looked into compression based distances as part of research for a masters course at the TU Berlin. What I found was a really interesting way of measuring distances between two textures (i.e. images).

Distances? Images!?

Yep. In principle one could measure some distances between any two …
item.dc:creator: Thilo Michael

item.title: My Octopress Blog
item.description:
UPDATE: My blog now runs on pelican. Ignore this post. Really.

So I have a new website/blog. It is made with the octopress blogging framework. Octopress is rather different from all the content management systems and blogs I've seen before. Since version 2.0 it is based on jekyll …
